privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy | Nursing, Women’s Health, Midwifery, and Gynecology Conference 2025 | Switzerland
privacy_policy.content:
This Privacy Policy outlines how the Nursing, Women’s Health, Midwifery, and Gynecology Conference 2025, taking place in Switzerland on October 2–3, collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to safeguarding the privacy of all participants, including nurses, midwives, gynecologists, healthcare professionals, and researchers. 

When you register for the conference or visit our official website, we may collect personal data such as your name, contact details, professional affiliation, and payment information. This data is used solely for conference-related communication, registration management, and logistical purposes.

We do not sell or share your information with third parties unless it is essential for delivering conference services or required by law. All personal data is handled in compliance with applicable data protection laws and GDPR regulations.

By accessing our website or registering for the Nursing, Women’s Health, and Gynecology Conference 2025, you agree to this privacy policy. For any questions regarding your data or to request data removal, please contact our organizing team.
privacy_policy.meta_keywords: Privacy Policy, data protection, GDPR compliance, Nursing Conference 2025 privacy, Women’s Health Conference data usage, Gynecology and Midwifery event Switzerland, healthcare conference data policy, October 2025 medical conference privacy
